sense.def:
To struggle to do something difficult
pomeni zelo si prizadevati naredili nekaj težavnega.

cit.quote: truditi se, bojevati se, s težavo si utirati pot

seg.quote: They struggle to build a more democratic society.
...a nationalist movement that has had to struggle for independence.

sense.def:
To struggle
pomeni, da se poskušamo osvoboditi, ko nas nekdo čvrsto drži.

cit.quote: upirati se, poskušati se iztrgati, otepati se

sense.def:
Kadar dva človeka
struggle with each other
, se spopadeta.

seg.quote: I had to struggle with men I could not even see.
There was a moment's struggle and the gun fell to the ground.

sense.def:
To struggle to move oneself
pomeni, da se nam z velikim naporom uspe premakniti.

seg.quote: He struggled forward for about half a mile.

sense.def:
Kadar je dejavnost
a struggle
, je naporna in se moramo pri njej zelo potruditi.

seg.quote: Reading was a struggle for him.
